message.body: Hey, can you bring over that roll of plastic that is a tube? I want to try to rig up ventilation for spray foaming my basement.
When you come to do sketch up.
I can do sketch up around 3pm.
Ok. That roll is bags and I use it to package my art. I can bring a few bags if u need em.
I just need about ten feet of tube and a box fan to keep the fumes from going into the house. I am thinking I can tape the bags around the outside and then cut the bottoms to make a tube.
Do you have the Sugatsune catalogs still? If so can you bring them with you?
